00044 #ifndef _nt_multidim_array_obj_h_ 
00045 #define _nt_multidim_array_obj_h_

00048 #include "nt_main.h"

00051 /* NT includes */
00052 #include "nt_error_obj.h"

00054 /* other includes */
00055 #include <vector>
00056 #include <cstdarg>
00057 //#include <limits>
00058 
00065 template <class T> // with regards to Modula-3 :)
00066 class NT_multidim_array_o : public NT_o {
00067 public:
00068 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00069 NT_multidim_array_o(NTsize d, NTsize n)
00070 {
00071     NT_ASSERT(d > 0);
00072     dim = d;
00073     NT_ASSERT(n > 0);
00074     num = n;
00075     // implementation range checking
00076     /* 2DO not working as numeric_limits not implemented in gcc 2.95
00077     NTreal numElem = pow(n,d);
00078     NTreal maxIndexRange = numeric_limits<NTsize>::max();
00079     if (numElem >= maxIndexRange) {
00080         cerr <<
00081         "NT_multidim_array_o::NT_multidim_array_o - Error : array will contain to many elements"
00082         << numElem << " for supported implementation range "    
00083         << maxIndexRange << " ("<< numeric_limits<NTsize>.max()
00084         << "). Undefined behaviour may result." << endl;
00085     }
00086     */
00087     // cache setup
00088     powerSeriesCacheVec.resize(dim+1);
00089     // = {1,num,num^2,...,num^dim}
00090     powerSeriesCacheVec[0] = 1;
00091     for (NTsize ll = 1; ll < dim+1; ll++){
00092         powerSeriesCacheVec[ll] = num * powerSeriesCacheVec[ll-1];
00093         cerr <<powerSeriesCacheVec[ll] << endl;
00094     }
00095     // memory allocation
00096     try {
00097         dataVec.resize(powerSeriesCacheVec[dim]);
00098     }   
00099     catch (bad_alloc) {
00100         cerr << "NT_multidim_array_o::NT_multidim_array_o - Error : Memory exhausted by allocation of multidimensional array."
00101         << ">" << powerSeriesCacheVec[dim] * sizeof(T) << " bytes of memory are necessary for this object."
00102         << endl;        
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 /* ***      COPY AND ASSIGNMENT ***/
00108 NT_multidim_array_o(const NT_multidim_array_o & original)
00109 {
00110  cerr <<"NT_multidim_array_o::(const NT_multidim_array_o) - Error : Not implemented. Not to be supported ?" << endl;
00111 }
00112 
00114 const NT_multidim_array_o&
00115 operator= (const NT_multidim_array_o & right)
00116 {
00117  if (this == &right) return *this; // Gracefully handle self assignment
00118  cerr <<"NT_multidim_array_o::operator= - Error : Not implemented. Not to be supported ?" << endl;
00119  return *this;
00120 }
00121 
00122 /* ***      DESTRUCTOR      ***/
00123 virtual ~NT_multidim_array_o()
00124 {
00125 }
00126 
00127 /* ***  PUBLIC                                    ***   */
00134 T &
00135 Elem(const vector<NTsize> & coordinateVec)
00136 {
00137     NTsize hash = Hash(coordinateVec);
00138     NT_ASSERT (dataVec.size() >= hash);
00139     return dataVec[ hash ];
00140 }
00141 
00153 const T &
00154 ElemByIndex(NTsize index) const
00155 {
00156     NT_ASSERT( (index >= 0) && (index < TotalNumElem()) );
00157     return dataVec[index];
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 void
00162 SetAll( const T & val )
00163 {
00164     for (NTsize ll = 0; ll < TotalNumElem(); ll++){
00165         dataVec[ll] = val;
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00175 T &
00176 Elem(NTsize index1 ...)
00177 {
00178     vector <NTsize> coorVec(dim);
00179     va_list args;
00180     va_start(args,index1);
00181     for (NTsize ld=0; ld < dim; ld++){
00182         coorVec[ld] = va_arg(args, NTsize);
00183     }
00184     va_end(args);
00185     return Elem(coorVec);
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 NTsize
00190 TotalNumElem() const
00191 {
00192     return powerSeriesCacheVec[dim];
00193 }
00194 
00195 //const T & Elem(vector<NTsize> coordinateVec) const;
00196 //const T & Elem(NTsize index1 ...) const;
00197 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00198 protected:
00199 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00200 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00201 private:
00202 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00208 NTsize Hash(const vector <NTsize> & coorVec) const
00209 {
00210     NT_ASSERT( coorVec.size() == dim );
00211     NTsize addressIndex = 0;
00212     for (NTsize ld = 0; ld < dim; ld++){ //2DO  WHY was ld < num+1 ?!?!?!
00213         addressIndex += coorVec[ld] * powerSeriesCacheVec[ld];
00214     }   
00215     return addressIndex;
00216 }
00217 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00218 vector <NTsize> dataVec;
00219 vector <NTsize> powerSeriesCacheVec;
00220 NTsize dim;
00221 NTsize num; // number of elements per dimension
00222 
00223 };
